metadata.synopsis: The Tabernacle priest's reaction when you steal from a divine coffer.

0.speaker: bd240ab2-013c-4160-b079-61edf84468a9
0.text: Hey, hands off that sacred offering chest! Those donations are consecrated to the gods - touch them at your peril.

1.speaker: bd240ab2-013c-4160-b079-61edf84468a9
1.text: Beware of blasphemy! Nothing good comes from angering the gods.
